title: Death's Door, studies for plate 11 for Robert Blair's 'The Grave'
medium: graphite with india ink wash on paper
provenance_text:
John Linnell, sold Christie's 15 March 1918 (lot 168) bt. Sabin; Gabriel Wells; A. Edward Newton? by 1919, sold Parke-Bernet 16-18 April 1941, 2nd day (lot 148) bt. Sessler for Charles J. Rosenbloom, bequeathed to Carnegie Institute 1973.

Provenance from Martin Butlin, The Paintings and Drawings of William Blake (1981) no. 632 (LWL September 2014)
